projects.title: Yorvik Parking App
projects.subtitle: Dock your longboat with ease — a modern parking solution for the City of York.
context: Developed through close stakeholder collaboration, it transforms a niche service into a seamless digital experience—from user registration to QR-based ticketing.
To guide the company I developed a detailed report, providing stakeholders with clear recommendations for the technical solution they needed.
projects.goals: Prioritized clarity and simple memorable UX flow using soft color cues and iconography.
process: Discovery: Stakeholder interviews based on use case scenario
Development: React Native + Express.js to mimic fully functional application
Integration: Expo Go to showcase to the stakeholders
features: Maintain a list of parking berths with visual map
outcome: Test users reported feeling more guided and relaxed during their experience — a reflection of emotionally intelligent UX.
As a result, stakeholders gained confidence in selecting the right technology and investing resources effectively to drive full-scale application development.
projects.reflection: It reinforced my commitment to designing experiences that guide users with clarity, empathy, and calm.
